description: It's James Hamilton's birthday and it's time for his gift!  James won't be disappointed for his big 3-0 as he'll get all he could ever have wanted from his sexy buddy Alex Adams. Alex is feeling very generous and has lots to make sure this special day is one his friend will not soon forget! After a nice oral intro these guys move quickly into some hot intense fucking and their chemistry on camera makes them beautiful to watch as a celebration of Men over 30.
title: Happy Birthday
